text.p: These are the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Canadian businessmen to arrive in Baghdad on Thursday.
- Iraq refutes Iranian allegations that it is not implementing an agreement between the two sides on prisoners of war and remains of soldiers killed in the Iraq-Iran 1980-88 war.
- A Greek trade delegation to arrive in Baghdad on Friday.
- Culture and information minister meets ultra-nationalist leader Vladimir Zhirinovsky.
- Chairman of Istanbul Chamber of Commerce says trade exchange with Iraq will increase by the end of this year to pre- Gulf War level.
- Iraq's health minister meets in Baghdad his Iranian counterpart.
